summary: Provides a Home Assistant sensor platform that fetches a web page, optionally authenticates and verifies SSL, extracts a value using CSS selectors or XPath, applies an optional template, and presents the result as a sensor entity with configurable name, unit and attributes.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users to monitor arbitrary data displayed on websites (e.g., prices, statuses) by scraping web pages, eliminating the need for dedicated APIs.
